song_lyric:
Love Hard
词：黄厚霖 曲：FuFit
Have you been a bad boy
Have you been a bad boy
Have you ever been a bad boy
Don’t worry bae
I always got your back boy
Have you been a bad boy
Have you been a bad boy
Have you ever been a bad boy
Don’t worry bae
I always got your back boy

快走开一边 爱我说得太熟练
想亲我不要靠讲
要不管一切给我持续渴望
这一刻抛弃自负及眼光
别再讲 带我去冲个浪
Boy 你别想偷懒
Oh Boy 你别想懒慢
Oh Boy 别要贪
Oh Boy there’s a lot you’ll see

Love Hard you just gotta love
It is gonna be your day
别计划演戏 你要给我真的你
你有运气
我会刻意让他跟他妒忌

Turn it up for me

Love it hard love it soft
入夜后没谁做错

用爱解开这个锁
Yo bae,
 I’m like a genie
in the bottle aight
When I’m by yourside everything’s gonna be alright
I’m a magic lamp boy so whatcha gonna do
Just make a wish and I will make your dreams come true
Boy 你别想偷懒
Oh Boy 你别想懒慢
Oh Boy 别要贪
Oh Boy there’s a lot you’ll see
Love Hard you just gotta love
Gotta love me the right way

It is gonna be your day

你有运气
我会刻意让他跟他妒忌

共我冲破这境界让热情放大
Love is fly 不要了解
越怕越界 越要踩
we’ll be floating in the sky
